abstract.original_text: Background: Some have claimed that the number of Covid-19 deaths is not much greater than would be experienced in the usual course of events. We sought to estimate the number of deaths due to Covid-19 in the United States and compare that number to the number of expected deaths in the same time period.

sentences.segment_text: Background : Some have claimed that the number of Covid-19 deaths is not much greater than would be experienced in the usual course of events .
We sought to estimate the number of deaths due to Covid-19 in the United States and compare that number to the number of expected deaths in the same time period .

abstract.original_text: Methods: To obtain the number of Covid-19 deaths, we multiplied published infection fatality rates by age by population numbers and assumed infection rates. The number of Covid-19 deaths was compared to the number of deaths using life table mortality rates.

sentences.segment_text: Methods : To obtain the number of Covid-19 deaths ,
we multiplied published infection fatality rates by age by population numbers and assumed infection rates .
The number of Covid-19 deaths was compared to the number of deaths using life table mortality rates .
